abstract:
We present a polynomial time 3/4-approximation algorithm for the maximum asymmetric TSP with weights zero and one.
As applications, we get a 5/4-approximation algorithm for the (minimum) asymmetric TSP with weights one and two and a 3/4-approximation algorithm for the Maximum Directed Path Packing Problem.
meta: Conference: Approximation, Randomization, and Combinatorial Optimization, Algorithms and Techniques, 7th International Workshop on Approximation Algorithms for Combinatorial Optimization Problems, APPROX 2004, and 8th International Workshop on Randomization and Computation, RANDOM 2004, Cambridge, MA, USA, August 22-24, 2004, Proceedings
